email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Verify Your PayPal Account Now

Dear valued PayPal customer,

We are writing to inform you that we have detected some unusual activity on your PayPal account. In order to protect your account from potential fraud and unauthorized access, we kindly request that you verify your account information immediately.

Please click on the link below to verify your account:

[Phishing link]

It is crucial that you take action as soon as possible to prevent any further unauthorized activity on your account. Failure to verify your account within the next 24 hours may result in temporary suspension of your account.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. We appreciate your cooperation in helping us ensure the security of your PayPal account.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security Team

Please note: PayPal will never ask for your password or personal information in an email. If you have any doubts about the authenticity of this email, please log in to your PayPal account directly through the official website to verify any account alerts.
